introToTopic: Discover the groundbreaking capabilities of Apple Intelligence, your personal AI assistant designed to revolutionize the way you interact with your devices and enhance your daily tasks.

announcements.announcement: Experience the power of Apple Intelligence through its advanced writing tools, making your communication more effective and efficient.

subDetails.excitedNarration: Effortlessly adjust the tone of your emails to perfectly suit any situation, whether you need a friendly, professional, or concise message!
Elevate your writing with the help of Proofread, ensuring impeccable grammar, word choice, and sentence structure in every email!
Quickly summarize lengthy emails by highlighting the key points and adding them as a handy TLDR section!

announcements.announcement: Unleash your creativity with Apple Intelligence's cutting-edge image creation tools, bringing your ideas to life like never before.

subDetails.excitedNarration: Create any emoji you can imagine with Genmoji, from a surfing T-Rex to a squirrel DJ, the only limit is your imagination!
Step into the Image Playground and watch as your text prompts come alive as stunning images in just seconds, with various styles at your fingertips!
Witness the magic as your rough sketches transform into polished, professional-looking images, thanks to the power of Apple Intelligence!

announcements.announcement: Experience a revolutionary way to interact with Siri, now powered by Apple Intelligence for more natural and intuitive conversations.

subDetails.excitedNarration: Talk to Siri like you would with a friend, enjoying natural, free-flowing conversations thanks to its advanced language understanding!
Siri now remembers the context of your conversations, allowing for seamless follow-up queries without skipping a beat!
subDetails.pointer: Siri remembers context for follow-up queries

subDetails.excitedNarration: Experience a truly personalized assistant as Siri draws information from your photos, calendar, messages, and more to provide tailored assistance just for you!
Communicate with Siri discreetly by typing your queries, perfect for those moments when you need a silent interaction!
subDetails.pointer: Type to Siri for silent communication

announcements.announcement: Apple Intelligence takes personalization to new heights, delivering features that cater to your unique needs and preferences.

subDetails.excitedNarration: Never miss what matters most as priority notifications intelligently sort your alerts, placing the most important ones at the top!
subDetails.pointer: Priority notifications based on user preferences

subDetails.excitedNarration: Become the star of your own automatically generated memory movies, as Apple Intelligence crafts personalized films from your cherished photos!
subDetails.pointer: Personalized memory movies from user's photos
